mapper.select: select recdetail.id as detailid, recdetail.recid as recid, recdetail.subid as subid, recdetail.item_dr as item_dr, recdetail.uom_dr as uom_dr, recdetail.qty as qty, recdetail.sp_amt as spamt, recdetail.sp as sp, recdetail.rp_amt as rpamt, recdetail.recdep_dr as depid, dep.department_desc as depdesc, recdetail.manf_dr as manfid, manf.manf_desc as manfdesc, recdetail.batno as batno, recdetail.expdate as expdate, recdetail.inv_date as invdate, recdetail.invno_amt as invnoamt, recdetail.invno as invno, recdetail.margin as margin, item.id as itemid, item.item_no as itemno, item.item_desc as itemdesc, item.item_sp as itemsp, item.item_spec as itemspec, uom.id as uid, uom.erp_uomCode as uomcode, uom.erp_uomDesc as uomdesc from erp_recdetail recdetail left join erp_item item on recdetail.item_dr=item.id left join erp_uom uom on recdetail.uom_dr=uom.id left join erp_department dep on recdetail.recdep_dr=dep.id left join erp_manf manf on recdetail.manf_dr=manf.id where recdetail.recid=#{ids} and recdetail.del_flag='0'
